content.text: Hi, I'm Sara. I'm single and I love animals. What about you?
Hi Sara, I'm Jane. I'm single too because my time is devoted to rescuing animals.
That's cool! I love Jane Austen too.
Me too! What's your favorite book?
It's hard to choose just one, but I really love Pride and Prejudice.
That's one of my favorites too! I love Mr. Darcy.
I'm also a big fan of his sister, Georgiana.
She's so sweet! I wish we had more female characters like her in literature.
I know, right? She's a great role model.
So, what are you up to today?
I'm just hanging out at home, watching some TV.
Me too! I'm watching a marathon of Pride and Prejudice.
That sounds fun! I'm going to have to join you.
Great! We can have a viewing party.
